DOC.brief_summary: Cystic Fibrosis hereditary , chronic respiratory illness . Cystic Fibrosis lead progressive decline lung function . School-aged child cystic fibrosis experience backpack carry everyday . Backpack carry induce restrictive effect responsible low lung function . Respiratory muscle strength also impair . No study assess aerobic capacity child 's gait carry backpack . The investigator hypothesize backpack carry induce acute decline lung function child cystic fibrosis compare healthy child . Investigators also hypothesize aerobic capacity impair .
DOC.brief_title: Backpack Carrying Children With Cystic Fibrosis
